title: Polls Close
description: The voting polls close across the country and the exit polls are annouced

title: First Seat Declared
description: The seat of Houghton and Sunderland South is the first seat to be declared.  It is won by the Labour candidate

title: Torys Hold Putney
description: Results show a modest increase in Conservative and Labour support and a collapse in the LD vote

title: Torys Hold Battersea
description: Results show a 5% increase in Tory support and further confirm LD collapse

title: Tory Hold
description: The Torys manage to hold on to the key marginal seat of Nuneaton

title: Revised Exit Polls
description: Revised exit polls show that the Conservative Party are on course to win a majority of the seats
